name: Explosio
description:
Controls:

Move: W.A.S.D, Z,Q,S,D or Arrow keys

Assault rifle: Left click 

Grenade launcher: RIght click

Goal: Eleminate all enemies, go to portal, proceed

You have been accepted into the  tv-show; Explosio! You must get send down to a randomly made level only equipped with an assault rifle and a grenade launcer. But you're not alone! The map is filled with enemies that want to kill you! So you must kill them in order to proceed! 

But why should you particepate in this show? Well, you can get so many points and come so high on the leaderboards! PLUS! It's super fun! 

We cant wait to see you!

Best regards, The Team Behind Explosio!

Explosio is  an action packed topdown shooter game.  Kill the enemies with your 2 types of guns. You need to satisfy the viewers of the show, but something isn't right...
